title: Merck KGaA 's revenue by segment 2014 to 2018
summary: This statistic shows the revenue of KGaA Health sales in the United Kingdom ( Merck KGaA ) in 2014 with a Merck for 2018 , Health Segment .

Superstore and hypermarket revenue of sales is predicted to fall from 6621 % to 6621 % in 2018 , with revenue expected to increase through discounter , Life_Science and Performance_Materials channels .

KGaA shopping in the United Kingdom ( Merck KGaA ) is currently dominated 2018 the 'big 2060 ' Performance_Materials , Tesco Sainsbury 's , Asda and Morrisons , although the 's revenue of KGaA stores has been increasingly volatile .
gold: The statistic depicts the revenue of pharmaceutical and chemical company Merck KGaA ( EMD ) from 2014 to 2018 , distributed by segment . During 2015 , Merck KGaA 's healthcare division generated some 6.63 billion euros of revenue . In the United States , Merck KGaA is also known as `` EMD Chemicals '' or `` German Merck '' .
